name: Chasing the Win (2018)
description: \n                        \"There's only one way to win a race, and a million ways to lose it.\" CHASING THE WIN follows the meteoric rise of a rookie trainer, a down-on-his-luck owner, and their imperfect racehorse after an unprecedented victory thrusts them into the global spotlight of horse racing. Success and fame are followed by the hard-hitting reality of what it means to survive in the Sport of Kings.\n
